headline: Public Storage Prices Public Offering of Senior Notes
summary: GLENDALE, Calif., June 27, 2025--Public Storage (NYSE:PSA, the "Company") announced today that the Company’s subsidiary, Public Storage Operating Company ("PSOC"), has priced a public offering of $875 million aggregate principal amount of senior notes (the "Notes"). The Notes will be guaranteed by the Company.
